list.description:
Remade the M36 sight of RideR2 (https://live.warthunder.com/post/677866/en/), because the numbers were displaced.

It's not as nice as his, but now it's a bit easier to read.


#M36 #realistic

Made a hopefully realistic enough sight for the T55E1

Sources used:

picture: http://www.theshermantank.com/wp-content/uploads/m70frecticle75mmsherman.png

realistic sight mod of RideR2: https://live.warthunder.com/post/677866/en/
He made awesome sights for almost all countries, but sadly stopped working on them

#realistic #t55e1

Sight for IS-2 (1944) for simulator battles. Features APHEBC (BR471B).

This sight works for several vehicles:
• IS-2 (1944)
• IS-2 "Revenge"
• (Chinese) IS-2 mod.1944
...

# 2a6 # leopard2a6 #leopard # leopard2 # leopard2a

Reticle for leopard 2a6.

Features:

Unusual sight color + yellow illumination.

Rangefinder and distance correction scale are close

How to install: Go to the game folder and unpack the archive in the UserSights folder - if it is not there, you need to create it.

Wishes, advice, requests - please in the comments.

Предлагаю пакет универсальных прицелов с темой ВМВ и для современных танков. Подходят всем танкам, под все режимы боев. Прицел для БР 1.0...7.7 имеет варианты основного цвета черный и белый (_B и _W), современный - основной зеленый, подсветка на всех прицелах голубая. Для установки откройте архив и положите папку all_tanks в папку UserSights в папке с игрой. Выберете нужный прицел в игре когда активен ваш танк (ангар, пробник, бой)

Schindibee's fictional "SCOLIA" Sight package for 75mm Pvkan m/43 Family

#customsight #sight #fictional #scolia #75mm #pvkv_m43_1963 #pvkv_m43_1946 #mdelat_torn #strvm42dt

This is a fully fictional sight package for the Swedish Pansarvärnskanon m/43 canon armed tanks, including the following easy to use features:

- Simplified ranging scale for main ammo
- Ranging funnels configured for tank lengths of 7m (full line) and width of 3.5m (dotted line)
- Deflection shooting aim crosses for targets traveling at 20 km/h (inner) and 40 km/h (outer)
- Additional scales for se...

Sights for KV-1 (ZiS-5) and KV-1S for simulator battles. Feature APHEBC (BRO350B) as well as smoke shells.

#sb #sim #simulator #simulatorbattles #kv1s #kv1zis5

#customsight #sight #fictional #scolia #76mm #m6a1 #m10 #m10_gmc #wolverine #t55e1

- Simplified ranging scale for main ammo
- Ranging funnels configured for tank lengths of 7m (full line) and width of 3.5m (dotted line)
- Deflection shooting aim crosses for targets traveling at 20 km/h (inner) and 40 km/h (outer)
- Additional scales for secondary and tertiary ammo (37mm AP and HE for the ...

Improved Sturmpanzer II Sight (15cm sIG 33 B Sfl)

#sturmpanzer_ii #15cm #15cm_sig_33_bsfl #fictional #15cmsig33bsfl #rangefinder
Copy folder UserSights into your main Warthunder root folder
Go to Testdrive
Press Alt + F9
Go to options -> Common Battle Settings -> Use alternative Sight Grid

Features

  • finer distances
  • standiametric Rangefinder
  • width Markers based on T-44

Sight on leopard 2a5. In fact, if it fits any tank if you transfer it to another folder.
How to install: Go to the game folder and unpack the archive in the UserSights folder - if it is not there, you need to create it.
The sight has a yellow illumination.
P.S. Translation level - google translate

Close copy of the warfare 2077 sight used in the April fools gamemode#
#2077
Thanks to all the commenter who told me how to change the color of the sight
The default color is green, and the lighting color is magenta

Sight for the USSR tank ISU-122S.

#isu_122, #isu_122s, #isu, #ussr_tank, #ussr, #usa, #cemen_054, #cemeh_054, #054

Description:
In the sight, the projectile penetration can be viewed depending on the selected distance. And also the flight time for this distance. So in battle, you can understand what kind of lead to take and whether the projectile can penetrate the target.

Friends, now you can support the development of sights for any amount.
https://www.donationalerts.com/r/cemeh_0...

Sight for T55E1 for simulator battles. Features APCBC.

#sb #sim #simulator #simulatorbattles #t55e1 #т55е1

I recently got the U-SH 405 and figured I'd make a useful sight for it, includes two different versions.


For some godforsaken reason the right launcher fires slightly higher than the left, so take that into account at longer ranges, generally speaking it will hit roughly in the reticles location but might shoot a tad high.


#ush #landsverk #ush405 #u_sh405 #u_sh_405 #ush_405 #sw_landsverk_ush_405

video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DIW0gCqdMWM&list=PLXIirS3OlzWOKDOo5ath9-vgv8DnjjFar&index=10

Сетка до 500м + пристрелочный пулемёт до 500м, пристрелена в ручную для РБ #panzerwerfer_42 #panzerwerfer #panzerwerfer42

IMPORTANT!!!
Make sure to use rangefinder on the sky and then reset its value (Controls > Ground Vehicles > (at the very bottom) Sight distance control > Reset axis value) for sight to work properly! Do it every time if you're using rangefinding option with laser rangefinder modification installed!

Sight for M3A3 Bradley for simulator battles. Features APFSDS, but it will also work for other shells (although I designed it specifically for APFSDS).

#m3a3bradley #bradley #simulator #sim #simulatorbattles

Прицельная сетка выполнена в немецком стиле. Она так же адаптирована к любой технике, но с один условием. В архиве есть два файла с прицельной сеткой. Первый - для техники с хорошей оптикой, а второй - для техники с не самой лучшей. Если возникли проблемы с прицелом, просьба, отписаться в комментариях.
#universal #germany #sights

video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aX4oluWAJ_E&list=PLXIirS3OlzWOKX0AAe7DPjQAoK_C8AFIz&index=7

Sight for the Germany tank Leopard 1A5

#leopard, #leopard1 , #leopard1a5, #germany , #german, #cemen_054, #cemeh_054, #054

Description:
In the sight, the projectile penetration can be viewed depending on the selected distance. And also the flight time for this distance. So in battle, you can understand what kind of lead to take and whether the projectile can penetrate the target.

Friends, now you can support the development of sights for any amount.
https://www.donationalerts.com/r/...

Прицел был выполнен в необычном стиле, риски дальности были убраны, дабы не портили вид, был лишь оставлен дальномер. В приложенном архиве лежат две прицельные сетки, они одинаковы, но одна из них "TH085" имеет размер 0.85, она для оптики с хорошей кратностью, а вторая "TH15" - для техники с не самой лучшей оптикой. Прицел является универсальным, но если вы ходите сделать прицельную сетку побольше, то в файле нужно найти параметр "fontSizeMult:r=1.5" и отредактировать по-своему, например: fontSizeMult:r=1.25.
#universal
